headline: Zebra Technologies Named a Major Player in IDC MarketScape for Retail Price Optimization Solutions
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., January 12, 2026--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating workflows to deliver intelligent operations, today announced it has been named a Major Player in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Retail Price Optimization Solutions 2025 Vendor Assessment report. The company has also been recognized as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Rugged Mobile Devices 2025-2026 Vendor Assessment and the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Rugged
